key.name: position-x
key.description: Stores the X coordinate of the widget position on the screen.

key.name: position-y
key.description: Stores the Y coordinate of the widget position on the screen.

key.name: scale-x
key.description: Stores the X coordinate of the widget scale on the screen.

key.name: selected-region
key.description: Stores the selected region for which notifications will be shown. If empty, notifications for all regions will be shown.
